knit 4 st for 6 row k2tog 3 st for 6 row k2tog then 2 st for 9 row k2tog bobble now experiment with what you want your tentacles to look like i chose to have mine pretty tightly coiled and knotted around each other safety pins come in very handy to hold things in place as you play with different configurations weaving in your reattachment tails first makes things a little neater once you have your tentacular configuration use the bobble tail to secure them against the base eyes are optional but i placed one inside a coil and the other inside my cast on ring before i pulled it tight of course you could add more eyes or less or even have different colors and pupil shapes depending on what you might have lying about inner bag using the contrasting color -
